aboutSection.title: Who are we?
aboutSection.p1: Serendipia is a multidisciplinary duo that combines dance and acrobatics to create a unique and innovative artistic style.
aboutSection.p2: Founded in 2020 by Diana Sauval and José Figueroa, they have brought their art to stages in Argentina and Turkey.
aboutSection.p4: - A six-month season in Antalya, Turkey (2024), with Innovacirco, performing duo acrobatics and Cyr wheel acts, under the organization of CINO Goldstar Organizasyon.
aboutSection.p5: - Performances at Flavio Mendoza's Circo del Ánima, and participation in shows by Runa Asociación Civil and the Phaway Company.
aboutSection.p6: - Invited to major festivals such as Circo el Andén 2023 (Neuquén) and Festival Payasadas 2023 (Buenos Aires).
aboutSection.p9: - Provincial festivals in Jujuy, La Rioja, Neuquén, and Santa Fe.
aboutSection.p10: - Municipalities: Malvinas Argentinas, Sierra de la Ventana, among others.

item1.name: Al Compás del Pivot
item1.description: Cyr Wheel Duo and Tango Act
